about_the_game:
Embark on a delightful journey to uncover 100 adorable cats hidden across a beautifully illustrated Shanghai setting. From bustling markets to serene gardens, every scene is brimming with details and feline surprises waiting to be discovered.

Game Features:

  • Explore Shanghai: Dive into hand-drawn scenes inspired by Shanghai's vibrant culture and architecture.

  • Find All 100 Cats: Test your observation skills and uncover every hidden feline.

  • Handcrafted Artwork: Start with monochromatic illustrations that fill with color as you progress.

  • Relaxing Gameplay: Perfect for unwinding with calming visuals and lo-fi music.

Whether you're a cat lover or a fan of hidden object games, this cozy adventure will bring you joy and relaxation. Can you find them all? Start your search today!

name: Cats and the City: Shanghai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD 3000 or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Find 100 hidden cats in the heart of Shanghai in this charming hand-drawn hidden object game! Suitable for dog-lovers
